description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Land We Live In: a pictorial, historical, and literary sketch-book of the British Islands ... Profusely illustrated, etc. [With contributions by Charles Knight, James Thorne, George Dodd, Andrew Winter, Harriet Martineau, William Harvey and William Michael Wylie.]" Contributor: DODD, George - Miscellaneous Writer Contributor: HARVEY, William - Artist Contributor: KNIGHT, Charles - Publisher Contributor: THORNE, James - F.S.A Contributor: WINTER, Andrew. Contributor: WYLIE, William Michael. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 2366.dd.2.", "British Library HMNTS 10368.r.2." Volume: 03 Page: 465 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1854 Publisher: William S. Orr & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002064922 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here. Please note that you will need to enter details from the above list - such as the shelfmark, the page, the book's volume and so on - when filling out your order. Following this or the link above will take you to the British Library's integrated catalogue.
